## Advanced Quarto

These workshops will prepare you to author a rich array of documents in [Quarto](https://quarto.org/), the next generation of R Markdown. This is an open-source scientific and technical publishing system that offers multilingual programming language support to create dynamic and static documents, books, presentations, blogs, and other online resources.
